name: EmberFountainhead.Index

classitems.description: After install of addon read in consuming application’s gitignore. If there isn’t an entry for vendor/feature-flags.js, use node fs to append it.
classitems.name: afterInstall

description: Fountainhead index blueprint is used to update the consuming application’s .gitignore to ignore the auto generated vendor/feature-flags.js file created by ember-radical. This file is used to create global variables if the consuming application has turned off JSUglify code stripping.

method.description: After install of addon read in consuming application’s gitignore. If there isn’t an entry for vendor/feature-flags.js, use node fs to append it.
method.name: afterInstall
